title: Big Hole National Battlefield: Press Kit
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Press Kit              Press Kit         Tipi frames stand as a memorial to the Nez Perce who were camped here in 1877. NPS Photo   Big Hole National Battlefield was established as a military preserve in 1883.  President Taft created Big Hole Battlefield National Monument on June 23, 1910. The park name was changed to Big Hole National Battlefield on May 17, 1963.
